boardgame.name: Netrunner
boardgame.description: Netrunner is a cyberpunk-themed collectible card game. The two players are the Corp (who wins by completing Agendas) and the Runner (who wins by infiltrating the Corp and liberating Agendas)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each side has a limited number of both actions and bits (money) to spend per turn; bits are gone once used, and actions must be spent to gain more._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;An important thing when evaluating the power of cards is to see the Bit per action ratio._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One unique feature of this game is that the Runner physically moves on the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;board_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; created by facedown Corp cards. It has the feel of a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;capture the flag_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; game, with the Runner moving in dataforts to steal Agendas from the Corp._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Another unique feature is that the Cards are NOT the primary strategy of the game; in fact, players can win by simply _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;playing with the rules_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; itself (a concept difficult to understand if you've never played Netrunner)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Both players play as both Corp and Runner in a game, one after the other, with each player's Runner going against the opponent's Corp. A winning match provides 10 points and the loser scores points equal to the number of agenda points scored/liberated. The winner of the game is the one who has the most points in the 2 submatches._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Though Netrunner is traditionally a two-player duel, there are formats that allow for more players (called _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;The Big Sell Out_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Richard Garfield himself considered Netrunner as his best boardgame design instead of CCG design game, and he loves games that include bluffing mechanics; with Netrunner, bluffing is an integral part of the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;When it was released in 1996, many gaming magazines gave Netrunner critical acclaim as the best CCG ever designed. Even today, most of them still consider this to be true._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 20 -- Your Deluxe Collectors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Edition, Free Shower and Deodorant Included

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: In the shrink-wrap, box is slightly worn.
One double-pack starter (with 2 playable decks) along with 3 sealed booster packs.
One sealed and one opened starter deck. One opened and four unopened booster packs.
Sealed double-starter set. Everything you need to play the game!
Two-deck starter pack. Everything you need to play the game. Mint in shrink.
1500+ cards in NM/M condition. Mostly from the base set, though there are a few from Proteus and Classic.
Netrunner Starter Double-Deck. Complete, includes a rule book with two decks. The cards and card boxes are in very good condition. The external box has some wear.
Starter deck in like new condition

New in shrinkwrap _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;starter double-deck_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. Shipping weight is 2 lbs. I ship within 24 hours of receiving payment and I package my games for shipment with the utmost care.

I have slightly less than 60 cards each for the Corporation and the Runner. Cards are all in like new condition, have been opened and played with once but no defects or wear. All cards are from the original edition (no expansions). It is likely that these are from a starter set missing a couple of cards from each deck. Frankly, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s been so long that I have forgotten exactly what happened.
Sealed Starter deck.
Netrunner - Wizards of the Coast Like New! Opened, but unplayed and in excellent condition. Pictures available upon request. Buyer to pay exact shipping costs plus $2.00 handling charge.
New, sealed Netrunner Starter Double-Deck. I have more than one available and I am happy to combine shipping. :)
This is a brand new sealed starter box.
Sealed Starter set (two decks).
This is for Johan only...

Netrunner. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not entirely positive, but am reasonable sure all of these cards are from the 1.1 edition. Great condition. 340+ cards, roughly half runner and half corporate. I know there are some rares, uncommons and commons in there - but don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know exactly what. I welcome international buyers!
Still in shrink-wrap: Netrunner Starter Double-Deck Contains one rulebook and 120 tradable game cards [one 60 card coporate deck and one 60 card runner deck]
This is a lot for sale to TuringTest. 2 opened Netrunner Starters (cards are mixed) and six unopened starters. Will ship for free.
2 starter packs with manuals in great conditon. Barely played, cards are in excellent condition. Boxes are in good condition. Fast shipping!

The price is for one (1) Limited 1.0 Booster pack. However, I have nearly an entire box full. I will create a new listing for however many packs you would like. I also have a few new double-deck starter boxes I could sell for $20 each. Shipping is at-cost via USPS. NOTE: I can accept Paypal ONLY if it is NOT funded by a credit or debit card. Paypal balance or e-checks (bank funded) transactions are fine.

One (1) double-deck starter pack. This includes two decks: one for a Corp player and one for a Runner. I have multiple starters available. I also have many Limited (1.0) edition boosters packs for $3 each. Let me know what you would like and I can make a custom listing for those items. Shipping is at-cost and is combined with multiple orders. Paypal is acceptable ONLY if it is NOT funded by a credit or debit card. Paypal Balance or an e-Check (bank funded transaction) is fine.

This listing is ONLY for BGG user rapmastersethmc. If you are not him, please do not click BUY. However, feel free to contact me, and I can make another customized Netrunner listing for you. I am selling double-deck starter packs for $20 each and Limited (1.0) booster packs for $3 each. This listing is for two (2) Netrunner double-deck starter packs and three (3) Netrunner Limited edition booster packs. Shipping is at-cost via USPS. NOTE: I can accept Paypal ONLY if it is NOT funded by a credit or debit card. Paypal balance or e-checks (bank funded) transactions are fine.

Netrunner 2 Player Starter Deck. Includes complete 60 card deck for each player (total 120 cards) plus rulebook. These cards are brand new, never opened. I bought a case on eBay and I really don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t need all of these. Noticed no one was carrying them here so I thought I would do all of us a favor! Netrunner plays incredibly well out of the starters (some say _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;it is the only way to play_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;). No need to be obsessed about collecting this game - one starter is enough (imo). FREE SHIPPING on this item to the US. Others pay actual shipping.

I will also include an additional partial set of commons and vitals. This lot will be $75 and shipping will be $6. I will send via USPS and include delivery confirmation. Thanks for your interest.

This listing has been worked out for jsharp. Complete set of Base Set Uncommons x4 - $40.00 Complete set of Proteus Commons x4 - $20.00 Complete set of Proteus Uncommons x4 - $50.00 All cards are straight out of packs and into card boxes. There may be some very limited handling wear but all cards are near mint. I also have multiple sets of the above, so just let me know what you are interested in. I would also be willing to discuss discounted pricing for multiple orders.

This listing is up to date as of 10/19/09. The price listing is simply for an unopened starter, but let me know what you want and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll adjust the price to match your wants. Netrunner 1.0, the base set. Unopened Starter (I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve got 4 total), $22.00 each Complete set of limited commons (I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve got four sets), $15 each set Complete set of limited vitals (I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve got two sets, possibly more once I get all my cards sorted), $8 each set Complete set of limited commons, $30 Bundle of 100 nonduplicate vitals and commons (numerous), $15 Bundle of 50 nonduplicate uncommons, $12 Inquire about rares, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve got 56 different rares available from the base set. Near complete base set (349 of 374 cards, all commons, uncommons and vitals and 85 of 110 rares). $170 or make an offer Netrunner Proteus nearly complete sets of commons (65 of 66; missing the Corp card, Sandstorm), $30 Additional commons I can bundle for about 50 cents each Set of 37 uncommons (out of 44), $45. Additional uncommons I can bundle for about $1 each Seven Proteus rares: Cybertech Think Tank, Executive Bootcamp, Obfuscated Fortress, Research Bunker, Pirate Broadcast, Prearranged Drop, and Bargain with Viacox. Make an offer for the rares (or see my trade listing for Netrunner for cards I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m looking to trade for). Nearly complete set of Proteus (134 of 154 cards; 25 of 44 rares, 43 of 44 uncommons and all 66 commons) for $140 or make an offer. For the collectors, probably 85% of my opened product is mint/near mint with the other 15% showing some modest play wear. The loose Proteus product is more like 95% NM. Shipping for a single Starter is $5.
includes several booster packs and a complete 2-player starter. Superb condition. Shipping at cost, will combine. Payment with paypal or money transfer in Europe.

This sale is for a bulk lot of 457 Netrunner cards. The lot includes 445 cards from the Unlimited Edition (1.0) and 12 cards from the Proteus Edition (2.1). In total the lot includes 123 uncommon cards and 23 rares. See the card list presented below for a full list of cards included in the lot. I am willing to ship via any method the buyer prefers, however, I recommend flat rate Priority Mail because it is economical and fast. Although I have not sold many games in the BGG marketplace, I have traded games on BGG extensively and invite you to look over my trade feedback. If you have any questions at all feel free to contact me here at BGG or via my personal email at: sheltonious@yahoo.com Thanks for looking. This is the last of what I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve collected and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling as either a single lot for $275 or I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll break it into three equal lots and sell each third for $110. The collection is comprised of 2008 total cards from version 1.0 (the base set of Netrunner), nearly all of which are in like new, unplayed condition. There are 299 vitals (between 3 and 11 of all 44 vitals in the limited edition); 950 commons (between 6 and 15 of each of the 88 commons); 638 uncommons (with at least 1 of 131 of the 132 uncommons; generally have 2 or more of each uncommon); and 120 rares (74 unique rares of the 110). I can provide a complete listing of the entire collection as an excel spreadhseet upon request. If you want a third of the collection, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll split the collection evenly, trying to maximize the diversity of cards. I can provide a listing for each lot and let you pick the lot you want. Shipping will be $10 to the US regardless of whether you want the entire collection or just a third. Other locations please inquire.
